name: code-formatter-and-minifier
description: A VS Code extension to minify and beautify JavaScript, and sort JSON files with one click.

commands.title: Sort lists by keys from current selection
Sort lists by keys from current file

javascript.description: Options for JavaScript beautify(js-beautify) and minification(terser).

html.description: Options for HTML beautify(js-beautify) and minification(html-minifier-terser).

css.description: Options for CSS beautify(js-beautify) and minification(terser).

json.description: Options for json and jsonL beautify and minification.

indent.description: String or number of spaces to use as white space for indenting.
